work.title: Frontend Engineer
work.description: Frontend Engineer. In charge of development for the Connect App, using ReactJS. Connect App allows over 40K members to easily access their accounts and perform transactions from their mobile devices. Development using ReactJS, Typescript, Cypress, Graphiti Spraypaint.

work.title: Frontend Engineer
work.description: Frontend leader for KAAX fintech project. KAAX is a currency exchange in real time without intermediaries platform. Landing page development using: NextJs, Redux, GraphQL and Strapi CMS.  Webapp development using ReactJS, Redux, Typescript, Sass and Websockets.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Frontend Development for Bib & Tucker Application. Bib & Tucker is a web-based uniform provider and management tools for the hospitality industry in New York. Used technologies: Django framework, Javascript.
